caller_intent: The caller (Alliance Insurance agent) seeks clarification on why a payment processed on Monday for a client's policy has not yet appeared in the client's checking account, despite an adjustment being posted today.
resolution_steps: Ann from Auto Owners confirms the payment was processed on Monday but explains it may take 1-2 business days to post to the account after processing.
Ann clarifies there were no errors on the caller's end and no deficiencies in the policies.
The caller agrees to inform the insured about the expected timing of the payment.
knowledge_required: Understanding of Auto Owners' payment processing timelines (delay between processing and posting to accounts)
Ability to check policy status for deficiencies
summary: An Alliance Insurance agent discusses a payment delay with Auto Owners Insurance's Ann. Ann explains that payments can take 1-2 business days to post to accounts after processing, and confirms no errors were found on the agent's end. The agent will relay this information to their client.
